ing: 1 large head leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces
des: "This is a great salad as a meal with grilled chicken or by itself.  This has been a winner with our friends and family.  Who can pass up a salad with three cheeses?"
ins: Combine lettuce, Swiss cheese, feta cheese, Parmesan cheese and pecans in a large bowl.  In a small bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, Italian seasoning, and pepper.  Add dressing to salad and toss well.
